headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Kaleidoscope Browsers and Lessons From Steve Jobs

docs.snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Tuesday's selection includes items on lessons drawn from the life and death of Steve Jobs, a tool that turns your Web browser into a kaleidos...
docs.abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Tuesday's selection includes items on lessons drawn from the life and death of Steve Jobs, a tool that turns your Web browser into a kaleidoscope, and cheaper cellphone chips from Samsung.
docs.lead_paragraph: Here are the interesting things that the tech reporters and editors for The New York Times found on the Web on Tuesday. Find more Scuttlebot items here.

headline.main: 2.1 Million Streamed the Super Bowl, NBC Says

docs.snippet: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said....
docs.abstract: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said.

headline.main: 2.1 Million Streamed the Super Bowl, NBC Says

docs.snippet: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said....
docs.abstract: That total made Super Bowl XLVI the "most-watched single-game sports event ever online," the network said.
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 2.1 million people turned on the live Internet stream of Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday night, NBC said on Tuesday, citing data from two measurement firms, Omniture and mDialog.

headline.main: Fed to Vote on Capital One Deal  for ING Direct

docs.snippet: Under Dodd-Frank, the Federal Reserve must weigh systemic risk when evaluating a deal - and shut down an acquisition that is likely to endanger the economy....
docs.abstract: Under Dodd-Frank, the Federal Reserve must weigh systemic risk when evaluating a deal - and shut down an acquisition that is likely to endanger the economy.

headline.main: Fed to Vote on Capital One Deal  for ING Direct

docs.snippet: Under Dodd-Frank, the Federal Reserve must weigh systemic risk when evaluating a deal - and shut down an acquisition that is likely to endanger the economy....
docs.abstract: Under Dodd-Frank, the Federal Reserve must weigh systemic risk when evaluating a deal - and shut down an acquisition that is likely to endanger the economy.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve is set to vote on Wednesday on Capital One's $9 billion acquisition of ING's online banking unit in the United States.

docs.snippet: The cuisine of the Catskills comes to TriBeCa....
docs.abstract: The cuisine of the Catskills comes to TriBeCa.

docs.snippet: What happens when your clothes bear a curious resemblance to the clothes you loved in high school? You regress and get dressed....
docs.abstract: What happens when your clothes bear a curious resemblance to the clothes you loved in high school? You regress and get dressed.

docs.snippet: What happens when your clothes bear a curious resemblance to the clothes you loved in high school? You regress and get dressed....
docs.abstract: What happens when your clothes bear a curious resemblance to the clothes you loved in high school? You regress and get dressed.
docs.lead_paragraph: What to do when everything you want to wear now - gingham and Converse; quirky pants and cable sweaters; slip dresses and slip-ons; military jackets and solid gold jewelry - bears a curious resemblance to the clothes you loved in high school? You regress and get dressed.

headline.print_headline: Anthony Will Be Out One to Two Weeks
headline.main: Anthony Out One to Two Weeks

docs.snippet: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz....
docs.abstract: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz.

headline.main: Anthony Out One to Two Weeks

docs.snippet: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz....
docs.abstract: The Knicks' Carmelo Anthony will miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in a win over the Utah Jazz.
docs.lead_paragraph: GREENBURGH, N.Y. - The Knicks announced Tuesday that Carmelo Anthony would miss one to two weeks with a groin injury sustained while running up the court in Monday's victory over the Utah Jazz.
